## Data Scientist | Teacher

**Final year** undergraduate, with a background in Computer Science and a core focus on **Statistical Inference** and **Trend Analysis**. Skilled at identifying hidden patterns within high-dimensional data and translating statistical significance into commercial opportunity. By leveraging **Unsupervised Learning** and **Predictive Modelling**, I transform raw data into actionable forecasts that mitigate risk and identify emerging market trends.
